revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{der|en|grc|ξένος|t=stranger}} + {{m|grc|γάμος|t=marriage}}. Synchronically, {{af|en|xeno-|-gamy}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-}} # {{lb|en|botany}} The [[transfer]] of [[pollen]] from the [[anther]]s of one [[plant]] to the [[stigma]] of another; [[cross-pollination]] # [[cross-cultural|Cross-cultural]] [[marriage]] ====Related terms==== * [[xenogamic]] ===See also=== * {{l|en|geitonogamy}}
